histogram.name: Cobalt.DOM.CSS.Link.ParseTimeMicrosPerKB
histogram.summary: A normalized ratio of time to KB of CSS parsing for link tags. Only logs a sample for links loaded through HTTP/HTTPS and greater than 1KB. See go/cobalt-js-css-parsing-metrics for the full design.

histogram.name: Cobalt.DOM.CSS.Style.ParseTimeMicrosPerKB
histogram.summary: A normalized ratio of time to KB of CSS parsing for style tags. Only logs a sample for HTMLStyleElements with CSS greater than 1KB. See go/cobalt-js-css-parsing-metrics for the full design.
